metadata.title: RHSA-2022:4915: rh-postgresql12-postgresql security update (Important)
metadata.description:
PostgreSQL is an advanced object-relational database management system (DBMS). 

The following packages have been upgraded to a later upstream version: rh-postgresql12-postgresql (12.11).

Security Fix(es):

* postgresql: Autovacuum, REINDEX, and others omit "security restricted operation" sandbox (CVE-2022-1552)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: Autovacuum, REINDEX, and others omit "security restricted operation" sandbox

platform: Red Hat Software Collections for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
